acceptedContracts().details: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

addPayments(address,address,bytes32,uint.details: Triggers to add total payments during the registration of the deal in close out netting

params.ccy: Main settlement currency of the deal

checkDefault(address).details: External function to check if `_party` is in default

getCloseOutPayment(address,address,bytes.details: Returns the close out payment between two counterparties

initialize(address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController

removePayments(address,address,bytes32,u.details: Triggers to remove aggregated payments during the liquidation of the deal in close out netting

params.ccy: Main settlement currency of the deal

requiredContracts().details: Returns required contract names in this contract

devdoc.title: Close Out Netting contract is used in close out operations Close out is the process while one of the counterparties declared as defaulted party and all deals should be terminated Contract linked to all product based contracts (ex. Loan, Swap, etc), and Collateral Aggregator contract.
